name: growth-mulch
effect: Used on a patch of soil : Plantâ€™s growth stages will each last 25% less time. Dries soil out more quickly.
short_effect: Growing time of berries is reduced, but the soil dries out faster.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It speeds up the growth of Berries. However, it also dries the soil faster.
flavor_text.platinum: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It speeds up the growth of Berries. However, it also dries the soil faster.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It speeds up the growth of Berries. However, it also dries the soil faster.
